title: Optimize Slow Database Query
description: A specific page in the application is consistently slow to load due to an inefficient database query.

tasks.description: Use an APM tool to identify the slow transaction and the corresponding database query.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pinpoints the exact query causing the slowdown.

tasks.description: Analyze the query plan and identify a missing database index as the cause of the poor performance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly diagnoses the need for an index.

tasks.description: Create a ticket for the DBA team to add the necessary index to the database table.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an actionable ticket to resolve the performance issue.
